meta.title: Gordon Parks Elementary School | Kansas City Charter School

meta.content: Gordon Parks Elementary School | Kansas City Charter School
Gordon Parks Elementary School | Kansas City Charter School
Every child deserves a champion. That's why each Gordon Parks Elementary School classroom has two teachers. Come see how we do things differently.

{"url":"https://www.gordonparks.org","name":"Gordon Parks Elementary School | Kansas City Charter School","description":"
Gordon Parks Elementary School, a Kansas City Missouri public charter school, currently serves over 175 kindergarten through fourth grade students.
Our Mission
Acting on its conviction that every child has promise, Gordon Parks provides urban-core children, including those who are at-risk, an individualized education that is balanced to develop character, intellect, creativity and physical well-being.","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/5914d21115cf7dcde4e437b2/t/5c93dc239b747a0c87f308cb/1587138700157/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

span.a: Gordon Parks Elementary School | Kansas City Charter School

img.alt: Gordon Parks Elementary School | Kansas City Charter School
Gordon Parks Elementary School | Kansas City Charter School
Gordon Parks Elementary School | Kansas City Charter School

h2.strong: Gordon Parks Families, First Student will begin delivering food Thursday, March 24th, for our students who are not currently in day care facilities throughout the day. These deliveries will be made at each bus stop. Please expect our team to be there between 8:30am and 10:30am each weekday with breakfast and lunch.
We look forward to seeing everyone back in school soon!

div.a: How may I help........During this pandemic, it's important to remember that our Gordon Parks kiddo’s needs go far beyond the education we provide. The family support, resilience support and social support we provide care for our children 24 hours a day seven days a week. Please help us continue this support while our school closes to keep our kids and families safe and healthy. Please consider making a gift, in any amount, to help us provide continued education and social support for our families. At Gordon Parks, we are family. We are a family of students, teachers, care providers and community. At this time it’s so important to support ALL of our families. MAKE A GIFT

h2.strong: Spectrum Internet Student Remote Learning Offer

div.p: Call 1-844-488-8395 and Ask for Coronavirus Promotion
2 Free Months (60 Days) No installation fee or payment*
*Cannot owe a past balance to Spectrum
Equipment sent via FedEx or Mail (1-2 days) or can pick up at a Charter/Spectrum Store Easy to install
Kansas City and St. Louis are included however availability may vary by individual address

an individualized education that is balanced to develop character,

a.strong: Help Lamiir build his dream LEGO house here!

img.alt: Thank you, Ernst & Young, for painting pumpkins and taking our 1st graders to recess. We had so much fun with you all today! #gordonparks #elementaryschool #charterschool #corporatevolunteer #volunteeropportunities #kcmo #kansascity #kansascitycharterschools

Thank you, Ernst & Young, for painting pumpkins and taking our 1st graders to recess. We had so much fun with you all today! #gordonparks #elementaryschool #charterschool #corporatevolunteer #volunteeropportunities #kcmo #kansascity #kansascitycharterschools

THANK YOU to all of our amazing Gordon Parks families for coming out Friday night to our fall kickoff and making this night successful! Family events are a chance for our families to speak to us about what they would like to see for the future of Gordon Parks and their child, and this was just our first family event this year! Our next family event will be on November 1 from 6-8 p.m. for our Trunk-or-Treat Parent Dinner Spooktacular. See you all there!
#kcmo #kansascitycharterschools #kansascity #kccharter #gordonparks #GPES #gordonparksfoundation #parentengagement

THANK YOU to all of our amazing Gordon Parks families for coming out Friday night to our fall kickoff and making this night successful! Family events are a chance for our families to speak to us about what they would like to see for the future of Gordon Parks and their child, and this was just our first family event this year! Our next family event will be on November 1 from 6-8 p.m. for our Trunk-or-Treat Parent Dinner Spooktacular. See you all there!
#kcmo #kansascitycharterschools #kansascity #kccharter #gordonparks #GPES #gordonparksfoundation #parentengagement

This week we were so thrilled to have Alex Espy with Paul Mesner Puppets come to our school and teach our students about using our emotions and how to calm our bodies when we are upset. Thank you so much Alex and Marcus!
#puppetshow #kansascity #kcmo #charterschool #kansascitycharterschools #paulmesnerpuppets

div.p: We are proud of our students, teachers and staff who work hard! Everyone has a role when we succeed.

div.p: It's the right time and the right place for you! We are enrolling for the 2019-2020 school year. Don't wait to enroll!

div.h2: Contribute to the Gordon Parks Way

div.p: We need your help to provide a quality education to our most deserving children in the Greater Kansas City area.
